ja493:11.4: vidalasūpiyo → siṅgiṃ bidalasūpiyo (bj, pts1) | siṅgividalasūpiyo (s2, s3) | siṅgīveraṃ lasūpiyo (mr) siṅginti siṅgiverādikaṃ uttaribhaṅgaṃ. vidalasūpiyoti muggasūpādayo (aṭṭha.)
ja493:12.1: tattha bhutvā khāditvā → bhutvā ca pivitvā ca (pts1)
ja493:17.2: ca kambalā → uddiyāne ca kambale (bj, pts1) | uddhiyāni ca kambalā (s2, s3)
ja493:22.1: tassānādiyitvā → tassa anāditvā (bj, s2, s3) | tassa anādiyitvā (pts1)
ja493:25.4: haneyyārisakaṃ → haneyya disataṃ (bj) | haneyya disakaṃ (s2, s3)
